english.segment1: Majesty. His majesty reigns supreme in me. Majesty. His majesty reigns supreme in me.
english.segment2: So give thanks to the Lord of Heaven, For His love endures forever.
english.segment3: And we sing hallelujah. hallelujah. Hallelujah to my King.
english.segment4: Majesty. His majesty reigns supreme in me. Majesty. Oh my God, Your majesty reigns supreme in me.
english.segment5: So give thanks to the Lord of Heaven, For His love endures forever.
english.segment6: And we sing hallelujah. hallelujah. Hallelujah to my King.
